parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm in the queue.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID for the queue to retrieve.

nested_items.name: queueId
nested_items.description: The queue ID.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the queue.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the queue.

nested_items.name: farmId
nested_items.description: The farm ID for the queue.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the queue.
ACTIVE---The queue is active.
SCHEDULING---The queue is scheduling.
SCHEDULING_BLOCKED---The queue scheduling is blocked. See the provided reason.

nested_items.name: defaultBudgetAction
nested_items.description: The default action taken on a queue if a budget wasn't configured.

nested_items.name: blockedReason
nested_items.description: The reason the queue was blocked.

nested_items.name: jobAttachmentSettings
nested_items.description: The job attachment settings for the queue.

nested_items.name: s3BucketName
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket name.

nested_items.name: rootPrefix
nested_items.description: The root prefix.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN.

nested_items.name: requiredFileSystemLocationNames
nested_items.description: A list of the required file system location names in the queue.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: allowedStorageProfileIds
nested_items.description: The storage profile IDs for the queue.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: jobRunAsUser
nested_items.description: The jobs in the queue ran as this specified POSIX user.

nested_items.name: user
nested_items.description: The name of the POSIX user.

nested_items.name: group
nested_items.description: The name of the POSIX user's group.

nested_items.name: user
nested_items.description: The user.

nested_items.name: passwordArn
nested_items.description: The password ARN for the Windows user.

nested_items.name: runAs
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the job should run using the queue's system user or if the job should run using the worker agent system user.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt

nested_items.name: updatedBy
